title: (Solved) Cannot Connect to Game
body:
I can do everything in the client until I get passed champ select. Once the game opens up I'm met with a completely black screen and a few moments later a pop-up that says League cannot connect to the server and to try my internet connection.

I have:
- completely uninstalled & reinstalled league twice
- tried deleting processes and reloading
- downloading a hotspot shield to re-route the firewall
- manually allowed league into private networks of firewall
- tried playing from multiple different internet connections
- /edit/ I've also hextech patched my game SEVERAL times

I'm not sure what to do so here's my last-ditch effort.
Thank you!

replies.body:
You've tried a lot of steps already, but it sucks that it's still happening.  :(  The black screen and issue you're having is very common for connection issues, and in this case failing to reach the game server.  For example, the black screen is due to failure to download assets.

There might be a more local issue that's causing this block in addition to firewall settings you've tried.  Your best bet would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide instead to troubleshoot.  Test it in a custom game, though!

Yay! I realized McAfee got downloaded on my computer somehow, and the date that it was installed correlated with the date League stopped working. Uninstalled it, and now I'm perfectly loaded into a custom game!
Thanks for the nudge in the right direction :) I appreciate it!! <3
Thank you  for your response. I will each one and see if I have any luck!
